name: Truffle-Infused Artisan Popcorn
description: Experience the ultimate in snacking luxury with our Truffle-Infused Artisan Popcorn. Handcrafted in small batches, each kernel is delicately popped and seasoned with a unique blend of earthy black truffle oil, sea salt, and a hint of cracked pepper. The result is an indulgent, aromatic treat perfect for special occasions or elevating everyday movie nights. This gourmet snack is made with non-GMO corn and contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring a pure, satisfying crunch in every bite.

attributes.ingredients: Non-GMO corn, black truffle oil, sea salt, cracked pepper
